entry.title: #lightning-dev IRC channel on freenode
entry.summary: The author of the message wants to inform that an IRC (Internet Relay Chat) channel has been created. The purpose of this channel is to provide a platform for discussing unfinished ideas. It is mentioned that the channel will be logged, which means that all conversations taking place in the channel will be recorded. The author also requests that any valuable outcomes of these discussions should be shared with the mailing list. This implies that the IRC channel is being used as a complementary tool to the existing communication channels. Overall, the IRC channel has been created to facilitate discussions and brainstorming sessions. It is a useful resource for exchanging ideas and coming up with innovative solutions. However, it is important to remember that the mailing list remains the primary means of communication within the group.
